org.kaaproject.kaa.client.configuration.delta.manager

Interface DeltaManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultDeltaManager

    public interface DeltaManager

    Interface for managing partial configuration updates.

    Use this manager to subscribe DeltaReceiver implementation for receiving configuration deltas instead of full resync updates from ConfigurationManager.

    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman
    See Also:
    DeltaHandlerId, DeltaReceiver, ConfigurationDelta

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerRootReceiver(DeltaReceiver receiver)
      Registers root receiver to receive first and full resync deltas.
      void subscribeForDeltaUpdates(DeltaHandlerId handlerId, DeltaReceiver receiver)
      Subscribes receiver for delta updates by the given handler id.
      void unsubscribeFromDeltaUpdates(DeltaHandlerId handlerId)
      Unsubscribes receiver from delta updates.

    • Method Detail

      • registerRootReceiver

        void registerRootReceiver(DeltaReceiver receiver)
        Registers root receiver to receive first and full resync deltas.
        Parameters:
        receiver - the root receiver object
        See Also:
        DeltaReceiver

      • subscribeForDeltaUpdates

        void subscribeForDeltaUpdates(DeltaHandlerId handlerId,
                            DeltaReceiver receiver)
        Subscribes receiver for delta updates by the given handler id.
        Parameters:
        handlerId - id of the delta handler
        receiver - the object to receive updates
        See Also:
        DeltaHandlerId, DeltaReceiver

      • unsubscribeFromDeltaUpdates

        void unsubscribeFromDeltaUpdates(DeltaHandlerId handlerId)
        Unsubscribes receiver from delta updates.
        Parameters:
        handlerId - id of the handler to be unsubscribed
        See Also:
        DeltaHandlerId
